sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button @click="encryptDes">1112121</el-button>
</template>
<script>
import { encryptDes, decryptDes,generatekey } from '@/static/js/DES.js'
export default {
  data(){

  },
  methods:{
    encryptDes (message, key = 'NTYyMzg5') {
      const keyHex = cryptoJs.enc.Utf8.parse(key)
      const option = { mode: cryptoJs.mode.ECB, padding: cryptoJs.pad.Pkcs7 }
      const encrypted = cryptoJs.DES.encrypt(message, keyHex, option)
      alert(encrypted.ciphertext.toString())
      return encrypted.ciphertext.toString() // 返回hex格式密文，如需返回base64格式：encrypted.toString()
    }
  }
}
</script>
